ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | addccncf2.1 | |- F = ( x e. A |-> ( B + x ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> A C_ CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ssid | |- CC C_ CC |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> CC C_ CC ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_constcncfg | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cncfmptid | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ CC C_ CC ) -> ( x e. A |-> x ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A C_ CC -> ( x e. A |-> x ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( x e. A |-> x ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_addcncf | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( x e. A |-> ( B + x ) ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B e. CC ) -> F e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) |
